snippet: State Auditor Troy Kelley, the elected official tasked with rooting out government fraud and waste, has been indicted by a federal grand jury on charges of fraud.
abstract: Washington State Auditor Troy Kelley is indicted on federal charges of filing false tax returns, attempted obstruction of civil lawsuit and possession of stolen property; is taking temporary leave of absence beginning May 1.
lead_paragraph: State Auditor Troy Kelley, the elected official tasked with rooting out government fraud and waste, has been indicted by a federal grand jury on charges of fraud.

headline.main: Washington: State Auditor Is Accused of Stealing From Business Clients
headline.print_headline: Washington: State Auditor Is Accused of Stealing From Business Clients
